TextBody:
Hi Sean,

Are you positive that you have a properly authenticated connection in order to add this file server to your host list through the Host Management feature of NAA v11.6?

NAA v11.6 - Add Hosts
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/HostManagement/Actions/Add.htm

NAA v1.6 - Connection
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Settings/Connection/Overview.htm

Let me know if you need me to send you a meeting invite.

Thank you,
Mike Candon
Senior Technical Support Engineer

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NmY5Q:ref

Hello
I have gone through the add host list wizard a few times trying to add the new file server. I add the new server manually then when I get to the second step I have chosen all three of the options for the credentials and get the same error on all of them. I have verified that the service account is active, not locked and the password is still correct.

[cid:image001.png@01DBA7B0.546528C0]

The new file server is showing in the activity monitor and it is showing changes in there as well.

Thanks

Jason

TextBody:
Hi Jason,
I am glad that we were able to get your issue resolved.
The following is a summary of the ticket for your records.

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!
+++++
2025_0407: Customer is running NEA v11.6.0.88 or so?? (far behind 11.6.0.139)
+++++
0) Only 1 of these 3 jobs normally takes days to run:

1) .Active Directory Inv running for 6 days and 10 hours

2) Active Directory running for 6 days 13 hours

3) Active Directory Advanced - 3d 5 hours

4) They were running at the same time and locking each other out

Error found in the SADebug.TSV log = "Failed to add host <HOSTNAME> to master: The transaction log for database 'StealthAudit' is full due to 'ACTIVE_TRANSACTION'.

This is because one ".AD Inventory" and 2 AD jobs were running (not successfully) at the same time.

5) Killed the 2 AD jobs and 1 .AD Inv job and now he was able to add the host name successfully.
+++++

Thank you,
Mike Candon
Senior Technical Support Engineer
__________________ _________
Powerful Data Security Made Easy
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
